creditline: Bequest of Mrs. W. C. MacFarlane
description: coffee urn; tapered body with narrow waist and neck; square plinth with pierced sides and ball feet; lid stepped and domed, topped by a cast pineapple finial; acanthus leaf handles
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

Engraved with arms and motto of Rawlings, Co. Cornwall, on body, and with crest above shoulder and on base.
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on upper part of body.  Maker\'s mark and lion passant on bezel of cover.
title: Coffee urn
